bind.relevant: (../../current_visit_type/value = '7034^FIRST DISPENSARY VISIT AFTER HCT^99DCT' or ../../current_visit_type/value = '7035^SECOND DISPENSARY VISIT AFTER HCT ^99DCT') and (../../systolic_blood_pressure/value > 100 and ../../systolic_blood_pressure/value < 140) and (../../diastolic_blood_pressure/value > 50 and ../../diastolic_blood_pressure/value < 90) and not(selected(../../tmp_drugs, 'enalapril') or selected(../../tmp_drugs, 'hctz') or selected(../../tmp_drugs, 'losartan') or selected(../../tmp_drugs, 'nifedipine')) and not(selected(../../review_of_systems_general/xforms_value, 'edema_legs') or selected(../../review_of_systems_general/xforms_value, 'shortness_of_breath_with_exertion') or selected(../../review_of_systems_general/xforms_value, 'oliguria') or selected(../../review_of_systems_general/xforms_value, 'focal_weakness'))
